modules.name: Data.Functor.Day
modules.comments:
The Day convolution of covariant functors.

Based on <https://hackage.haskell.org/package/kan-extensions/docs/Data-Functor-Day.html>

declarations.comments: Day convolution of two covariant functors
declarations.title: Day

declarations.comments: Unpack a value of type `Day f g a`.
declarations.title: runDay

declarations.comments: Construct a value of type `Day f g a`.
declarations.title: day

declarations.comments: `f âŠ— f` whenever `f` is `Applicative`.
declarations.title: dap

declarations.comments: Eliminate a `Day` convolution of two paired functors.
declarations.title: elimPair

declarations.comments: Pair two `Day` convolutions when their components pair.
declarations.title: pairDay

declarations.comments: Hoist a natural transformation over the left hand side of a 'Day' convolution.
declarations.title: hoistDay1

declarations.comments: Hoist a natural transformation over the left hand side of a 'Day' convolution.
declarations.title: hoistDay2

modules.name: Data.Functor.Day.Hom
modules.comments:
The internal hom in the category of functors with Day
convolution as the monoidal tensor.

declarations.comments:
This is the internal hom in the category of functors with Day
convolution as the monoidal tensor.
declarations.title: Hom

declarations.comments: The curry function for the internal hom object `Hom`
declarations.title: curryHom

declarations.comments: The uncurry function for the internal hom object `Hom`
declarations.title: uncurryHom

declarations.comments: The composition map for the internal hom object `Hom`
declarations.title: composeHom

declarations.comments: The evaluation map for the internal hom object `Hom`
declarations.title: evalHom

declarations.comments: `Hom` generalizes pairings which have been applied to their first argument.
declarations.title: pairingHom

declarations.comments: Every functor `f` pairs with `f âŠ¸ Identity`.
declarations.title: pairHom

declarations.comments: A profunctor in the category of functors and natural transformations.
declarations.title: Profunctor

declarations.comments: A strong profunctor with respect to Day convolution.
declarations.title: Strong

declarations.comments: Natural transformations form a `Strong` profunctor.
declarations.title: NT

declarations.comments: A general type for profunctor optics in the functor category.
declarations.title: Optic

declarations.comments: An isomorphism of functors.
declarations.title: Iso

declarations.comments:
A lens with respect to Day convolution, which identifies
one functor as a Day convolution of another with a third,
unknown functor.
declarations.title: Lens

declarations.comments: Create a profunctor lens from a getter-setter pair.
declarations.title: lens

declarations.comments: Hoist a natural transformation over the specified optic.
declarations.title: hoistOf
